Texts.Eng: Good job. I'll fix up your ships ^green;Impulse Drive^reset;. It should no longer have a 47.3% chance of exploding on activation! Now we need to find an energy source sufficient to craft a new ^orange;FTL Drive^reset;
Good job. There's one more step to getting your ^green;Ship^reset; fixed: an ^orange;Electromagnet^reset;. Build one at your ^green;Machining Table^reset;.
Great work! Next, you are going to need to make ^orange;Wire^reset; at the ^green;Machining Table^reset;. It'll be necessary for the next step in fixing your ^green;Ship^reset;.

Greetings, stranger! I detected your ^orange;Protectorate^reset; signature entering the system and investigated immediately. You were on a ^red;collision course with the sun^reset; here, so I went ahead and redirected your nav system.

If you want to get off this planet, you're going to need to repair your ship. Step one will be ^orange;Creating a Machining Table^reset; in your ^green;[C]rafting menu^reset;. With it we can start to repair your teleporter and engines.

Seems I was just in time, too. Your ^orange;FTL drive^reset;, according to scans, was ^red;completely broken^reset; and your impulse drive is basically dead in the water. I think maybe we can help each other.
Some of the finest scientific minds in the universe visit there often, and there is a great deal you could learn. Find the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset; on your SAIL!

Take this ^orange;Personal Tricorder^reset;. It has several useful functions. Click [Mouse 1] for the medical scan function. Press [Mouse 2] for the ^green;Task Manager^reset; and press [Shift + Mouse 1] for the Tool Configuration dialog.

Thanks for investigating that for me! Your help is ^green;deeply appreciated^reset;! As a thanks...take these ^orange;coordinates for your SAIL^reset;. I run the facility there and I think you'll like it.

Unfortunately, it might be a little bit dangerous. There is an old abandoned mine on the surface of this planet. I've detected ^orange;strange readings^reset; coming from within that mine. It might provide the pwoer you need.
Without a ^orange;Tricorder^reset; we can't scan for a ^orange;power source^reset; for your ship. I can provide one for you if you ^orange;complete my tasks^reset;.
Without a ^orange;Tricorder^reset; we won't be able to proceed. It needs to interface with this machine to properly enable the power.
